DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate effect filgotinib versus placebo adult active rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) inadequate response methotrexate ( MTX ) .
DOC.brief_title: Filgotinib Combination With Methotrexate Adults With Moderately Severely Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Have Inadequate Response Methotrexate
DOC.criteria: Have diagnosis RA ( 2010 ACR/EULAR criterion ) , ACR functional class IIII . Have ≥ 6 swollen joint ( swollen joint count base 66 joint ( SJC66 ) ) ≥ 6 tender joint ( tender joint count base 68 joint ( TJC68 ) ) screen Day 1 . Ongoing treatment stable dose MTX Previous treatment janus kinase ( JAK ) inhibitor
